channel.title: Help with special restore please!
channel.description:
So like i seen this codes where i can change the time seconds to how long it takes to get back 100spec restored back.And I seen a code that talked about a ring and saw on the very right "Ring of Vigour".It works with the ring of vigour for the time seconds for how long it restores back to 100 spec.I thought since it said "Ring" and on the right it said "ring of vigour" i thought that if you change the ring of vigour's name to a different type of ring.It'll work for that ring.Might sound stupid to think that,but i gave it a shot.And it didnt work :P.I was wondering how i can change it? I want it to work for my perfect ring :D It looks like this :)
Where it says "perfect ring" it was actually ring of vigour,just thought it would work if i changed the name and i was wrong :rolleyes: HELP PLZ!THX! :D
[code] public static final int INCREASE_SPECIAL_AMOUNT = 10000; // how fast your special bar refills public static final int INCREASE_SPECIAL_AMOUNT_WITH_RING = 1000 ; // how fast your special bar refills with 'perfect'_ring public static final boolean PRAYER_POINTS_REQUIRED = true; // you need prayer points to use prayer public static final boolean PRAYER_LEVEL_REQUIRED = true; // need prayer level to use different prayers public static final boolean MAGIC_LEVEL_REQUIRED = true; // need magic level to cast spell public static final int GOD_SPELL_CHARGE = 300000; // how long does god spell charge last? public static final boolean RUNES_REQUIRED = true; // magic rune required? public static final boolean CORRECT_ARROWS = true; // correct arrows for bows? public static final boolean CRYSTAL_BOW_DEGRADES = false; // magic rune required? [/code]

item.title: Help with special restore please!
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

you were close though it was in the client.java thx for helping!

Read full topic

item.title: Help with special restore please!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

In my server the ring of vigour is ID: 19669
So search the ID (or your vigour’s ID) and it should come up in a file like CombatAssistant. There’s a specific method that handles special restore but I can’t remember the name. Anyways, after you find the method it will have something like if(Config.INCREASE_SPECIAL_AMOUNT_WITH_RING) { and some code after that, what you want to do is change the ID that’s in there, which is your vigour.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with special restore please!
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

So like i seen this codes where i can change the time seconds to how long it takes to get back 100spec restored back.And I seen a code that talked about a ring and saw on the very right “Ring of Vigour”.It works with the ring of vigour for the time seconds for how long it restores back to 100 spec.I thought since it said “Ring” and on the right it said “ring of vigour” i thought that if you change the ring of vigour’s name to a different type of ring.It’ll work for that ring.Might sound stupid to think that,but i gave it a shot.And it didnt work :P.I was wondering how i can change it? I want it to work for my perfect ring It looks like this

Where it says “perfect ring” it was actually ring of vigour,just thought it would work if i changed the name and i was wrong :rolleyes: HELP PLZ!THX!

public static final int INCREASE_SPECIAL_AMOUNT = 10000; // how fast your special bar refills public static final int INCREASE_SPECIAL_AMOUNT_WITH_RING = 1000 ; // how fast your special bar refills with 'perfect'_ring public static final boolean PRAYER_POINTS_REQUIRED = true; // you need prayer points to use prayer public static final boolean PRAYER_LEVEL_REQUIRED = true; // need prayer level to use different prayers public static final boolean MAGIC_LEVEL_REQUIRED = true; // need magic level to cast spell public static final int GOD_SPELL_CHARGE = 300000; // how long does god spell charge last? public static final boolean RUNES_REQUIRED = true; // magic rune required? public static final boolean CORRECT_ARROWS = true; // correct arrows for bows? public static final boolean CRYSTAL_BOW_DEGRADES = false; // magic rune required?
